title: El Capitan for mac and running league on it??
body:
Does the new El Capitan for Mac (Kinda not new now just haven't updated still have 10.8 aha) run league and does it work properly without any bugs or not loading properly as i wanted to know cause I'm downloading it right now to upgrade to the new 10.11 a few people have told me not too as its super buggy and league doesn't run well on it and wanted to know if anyone has experienced any problems running league or running El Capitan all together??

Thank you to who ever answers (I'm not a tech wizard) :)

replies.body:
Let me clarify your concerns.

1. It works just fine, I use high on all graphics and still get 60fps (I am using a mac air and got more on a mac pro)

2. As I said above it performs at a mediocre standard and should alright for all people although this also greatly depends on the number of other programs running in the background or virus' your computer may have as both of these greatly effect your computers performance.

3. In the past I have recieved issues with running league on this update although thise were all caused by internal issues riot and otherwise the launcher works fine.

4. I have been running league on my mac for a good few months aswell as have been running this update since january and I have not encountered any serious issues that this update has caused.

If you need anything else just ask.
- Jett

> [{quoted}](name=Katlife,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7l4EuiNZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-10T11:39:15.675+0000)
>
> Let me clarify your concerns.
> 
> 1. It works just fine, I use high on all graphics and still get 60fps (I am using a mac air and got more on a mac pro)
> 
> 2. As I said above it performs at a mediocre standard and should alright for all people although this also greatly depends on the number of other programs running in the background or virus' your computer may have as both of these greatly effect your computers performance.
> 
> 3. In the past I have recieved issues with running league on this update although thise were all caused by internal issues riot and otherwise the launcher works fine.
> 
> 4. I have been running league on my mac for a good few months aswell as have been running this update since january and I have not encountered any serious issues that this update has caused.
> 
> If you need anything else just ask.
> - Jett

You've pretty much said everything i wanted to know :) thank you!

Yeah it works fine.

I run my Mac on Windows these days anyway but I've tested it on OS X and it still works normally.
Works fine for me, but I'm not sure about others though.

> [{quoted}](name=Cuddly Panda,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7l4EuiNZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-10T08:08:41.811+0000)
>
> Works fine for me, but I'm not sure about others though.

Is it even any good like performance wise?
